ValidationRule.description: MPLACE OF RECEIPT and MPLACE OF DELIVERY must be different from each other.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK(MPlace_Of_Receipt__c) ), NOT( ISBLANK(MPlace_Of_Delivery__c) ), MPlace_Of_Receipt__c = MPlace_Of_Delivery__c) , true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PLACE OF RECEIPTとPLACE OF DELIVERYは一致してはいけません。ご確認の上、正しく再入力してください。 PLACE OF RECEIPT must be different from PLACE OF DELIVERY. Please re-enter the correct data.
